/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
